# Add an image to a product or trade offer catalog.productImage.add

{% note warning "We are still updating this page" %}

Some data may be missing here — we will complete it shortly.

{% endnote %}

{% if build == 'dev' %}

{% note alert "TO-DO _not exported to prod_" %}

- missing response on success
- missing response on error
- no examples in other languages
- link to the article File Processing (should be at js_library/rest/files.md)
  
{% endnote %}

{% endif %}

> Scope: [`catalog`](../../scopes/permissions.md)
>
> Who can execute the method: any user

## Description

```http
catalog.productImage.add(fields, fileContent)
```

This method adds an image to a product or trade offer.

## Parameters

#|
|| **Parameter** | **Description** ||
|| **fields**
[`object`](../../data-types.md)| An array containing the following fields:
- **productId** – the identifier of the product or offer (required field);
- **type** – the type of image. Three values can be specified:
  - `DETAIL_PICTURE` – the image will be saved as a detail picture;
  - `PREVIEW_PICTURE` – the image will be saved as a preview;
  - `MORE_PHOTO` or left empty – the image will be saved in the `MORE_PHOTO` property of the product. ||
|| **fileContent^*^** | `product_file`, the structure is similar to that described in the article File Processing. ||
|#

{% include [Footnote on parameters](../../../_includes/required.md) %}

## Examples

```javascript
BX24.callMethod(
    'catalog.productImage.add',
    {
        'fields': {
            'productId': 1,
            'type': 'PREVIEW_PICTURE'
        },
        'fileContent': [
            'test.jpeg',
            ''
        ]
    },
    function(result) {
        if (result.error())
            console.error(result.error().ex);
        else
            console.log(result.data());
    }
);
```
{% include [Footnote on examples](../../../_includes/examples.md) %}
